title: Goldilocks and the three bears
brief_description: The story of Goldilocks and the three bears, remaining faithful to the incidents and characterizations of the original tale. Suggestions for drawing pictures of the scenes of the story and for exploring other favourite stories provide children with an incentive for reading and artwork activities.
